About Curated By Ray

Curated By Ray is a boutique travel company dedicated to crafting seamless, personalized journeys across Africa and beyond. From Kenya‚Äôs wild heartlands to the tropical escapes of Zanzibar, Dubai, and Bali, every itinerary is designed to reflect your rhythm, curiosity, and sense of adventure. We believe travel should feel effortless yet extraordinary ‚Äî guided by detail, intention, and care. Whether it‚Äôs a family getaway, romantic escape, or curated group experience, we bring destinations to life through comfort, connection, and local expertise.
